title: Quest for 520 - Need Bat Off Cobb
author: parkerj33

posts.post_title: Quest for 520 - Need Bat Off Cobb
posts.post_content:
Making great progress....One real biggie left - cobb bat off.

Looking for graded or raw, presentable (no trims, no creasing, reverse paper loss ok)

Paypal ready to go!

Have 497/520..Still need these below: 


Hall of Famers
Ty Cobb (Bat Off Shoulder)

Tom Guiheen
George Manion
Juan Violat
